00020 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 // This class  -contains map of  particular layout which is used
00022 //   during searching for net name.
00023 // To avoid useless operations the map of layout is created only
00024 // when somebody will request it ,calling findNetId().Next call to
00025 // this function already doesn\'t do it ( only clears out previous
00026 // tracing information).
00027 // Every cell record contains:
00028 //        layers -  bits are set if coresponding layer is present
00029 //                  in basic image
00030 //        visited - bit is set if corresponding point was already visited
00031 //        termNo  - number of terminal net in this point.When zero - there\'s
00032 //                  no terminal  here .Value 1 means "constrained" net
00033 //        criAreaNo - if this grid belongs to critical area then here
00034 //                  there's it's number ( equal position in criLines -1)
00035 //                  otherwise  set to 0
00036 //        uniNo   - number of restricted feed (position in base array) if
00037 //                  exists in this point
00038 
00039 class  LayMap 
00040 {
00041     public :
00042 
00043      LayMap(LAYOUT *,ImageMap *,Array *);
00044      ~LayMap();
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048

00052       unsigned int           findNetId(int,int,layerType,short*);
00053       void                   addCriticalPoints(Clst &,short*);
00054       int                    getHor(){ return imageMap->cols;}
00055       int                    getVer(){ return imageMap->rows;}
00056     
00057     private  :
00058 
00059 
00060       // function members :
00061 
00062     unsigned  int   search(int,int,layerType);
00063     void            create();

00065     void            goDeeper(SLICE *,LAYOUT *,short *);
00066     void            refresh();
00067     void            addTerms(short *);
00068     void            recognizeTerminals();
00069     void            clearFlags();
00070       
00071       // data members :
00072 
00073      int              xMin;         // in grid points
00074      int              xMax;
00075      int              yMin;
00076      int              yMax;
00077       
00078      Boolean          initFlag;     // contains true if map already created 
00079      layoutMapType    **map;
00080

00084      Array            *freeNets;
00085 
00086 };
